children.text: The pins and clips that secure the downpipe to the wall have not been fully installed in all areas.
The Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 7.05 Fixing of gutters and downpipes states that
‘Gutters and downpipes are defective if they are not securely fixed’ .
These pins and clips must be properly installed to secure the downpipes in accordance with above.
